keyindex = [6994, 7321, 7530, 8316, 8647, 8712, 9386, 9809, 9910, 12758, 12775, 12802, 13902, 13910, 13911, 13915, 14383, 15265, 15269, 15278, 15281, 15282, 15286, 15718, 15719, 15720, 15925, 15926, 15927, 15928, 15930, 15975]
for i in bpy.context.active_object.data.vertices: 
    if i.index in keyindex:
        i.select = True



Verts = [i.index for i in bpy.context.active_object.data.vertices if i.select]
print(Verts)
